text: After a recent campaign the Grudgebringers are available to hire. The Empire is always in need of good soldiers and Commander Bernhardt and his troops are some of the finest available. They have shown strength and loyalty to the crown on many occasions, fighting many successful campaigns against our foes. They could prove invaluable, yet again, in the defence of the Empire and her allies in these dark times.
